deposit_vndc_desc: Buy VNDC and deposit crypto instantly

no_request_id: Your account cannot connect to Nami, please contact our customer services team for further information.

if_not: If you have completed the transaction but your VNDC balance at Nami Exchange still have not changed, please contact our hotline: 1900888666
bank_offline: Withdraw gateway is under maintenance, please comeback after few minutes.

errors.network_not_support: Withdrawal of {{ asset }} on {{ chain }} network is currently not supported.
errors.network_not_support_dep: Deposit of {{ asset }} on {{ chain }} network is currently not supported.

errors.invalid_kyc_status: Please verify your account to perform this action.
errors.decimal_scale_limit: Please enter amount with no more than {{ value }} decimal places
errors.withdraw_disabled: Withdrawal is currently under maintenance, please try again later.

Your order has been recorded,
please wait for a moment

futures_overview:
Trading Futures with leverage up to X125.
Transfer funds to your Futures Wallet to start trading.
staking_overview: Staking NAMI to receive bonus interest up to 50%/year.
farming_overview: Farming NAMI and get many potential tokens.

notes.common: Please carefully check the information about the token, the token network before transferring the token. Only send {{ tokenName }} to this address, sending any other tokens may result in the loss of tokens.
notes.kai: For KAI tokens, NamiExchange only supports Kardiachain Mainnet, please make sure your entered information is correct.
notes.memo_1: Send {{ tokenName }} with MEMO to this address, the deposit will be completed after {{ block }} block confirmations.
notes.memo_2: Multi-send transaction is not supported, send only {{ tokenName }} to this address. Send other tokens may result in loss of your deposit.
notes.memo_tips: Both a MEMO and an Address are required to successfully deposit your {{ tokenName }}. Nami will not handle any deposit which lacks information.
notes.memo_wdl_tips: In some case, Memo is needed and Nami will not take any responsibility if you withdraw without Memo information and the withdrawal does not reach to your wallet.

mobile.tips: Assets will be withdrawn to your ONUS wallet in a short time.
mobile.unsupported_asset: The asset currently does not support transferring
